title: Tutorials
description: Unleash your coding potential with our curated tutorials.

items.title: Codecademy
items.description: Learn by doing with Codecademy's interactive coding challenges. Choose from a wide range of programming languages and web development tracks to build practical skills through real-world projects.

items.title: Geeks For Geeks
items.description: A Computer Science portal for geeks. It contains well written, well thought and well explained computer science and programming articles, quizzes and practice/competitive programming/company interview Questions.

items.title: Khan Academy Computer Programming
items.description: Master the fundamentals of computer programming with Khan Academy's interactive courses.  Their platform offers a structured learning path, perfect for beginners or those seeking to brush up on core concepts. Explore topics like JavaScript, SQL, and HTML/CSS.

items.title: MDN
items.description: The MDN Web Docs site provides information about Open Web technologies including HTML, CSS, and APIs for both Web sites and progressive web apps.

items.title: Programiz
items.description: Learn to code in Python, C/C++, Java, and other popular programming languages with our easy to follow tutorials, examples, online compiler and references.

items.title: W3schools
items.description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, Python, PHP, Bootstrap, Java, XML and more.
